dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my goodness, the National Kurultai? What in the world is that? Like, really, what is it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my goodness, the National Kurultai? What in the world is that? Like, really, what is it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah, it sounds, um, like a mouthful, doesn't it? It's actually an important advisory body, established by President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah, it sounds, um, like a mouthful, doesn't it? It's actually an important advisory body, established by President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 15, 2022, President Tokayev decreed the establishment of the National Kurultai under the President, approved its regulations, and determined its composition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, an advisory body. But why are we, like, suddenly hearing about it now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, an advisory body. But why are we, like, suddenly hearing about it now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they're having their fourth session coming up pretty quickly. March 14th, in Burabay.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they're having their fourth session coming up pretty quickly. March fourteenth, in Burabay.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev will take part in the fourth session of the National Kurultai, according to his advisor and press secretary, Ruslan Zheldibay. The session will be held on March 14 in Burabay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Burabay, okay. So President Tokayev will be there? Is he, like, giving a big speech?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Burabay, okay. So President Tokayev will be there? Is he, like, giving a big speech?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. His press secretary, Ruslan Zheldibay, confirmed he'll deliver a speech, and members will offer proposals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. His press secretary, Ruslan Zheldibay, confirmed he'll deliver a speech, and members will offer proposals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev will take part in the fourth session of the National Kurultai, according to his advisor and press secretary, Ruslan Zheldibay. ... "During the event, the Head of State will deliver a speech, and members of the Kurultai will present their proposals on pressing social issues," Zheldibay wrote on his Telegram channel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Proposals on what, though? Like, new laws or just… ideas?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Proposals on what, though? Like, new laws or just... ideas?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: More specifically, on pressing social issues. Things that really affect, um, everyday life.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: More specifically, on pressing social issues. Things that really affect, um, everyday life.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "During the event, the Head of State will deliver a speech, and members of the Kurultai will present their proposals on pressing social issues," Zheldibay wrote on his Telegram channel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So they've done this before, then? Is this the first time?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So they've done this before, then? Is this the first time?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh no, this is the fourth. They’ve actually met in Ulytau, Turkestan, and Atyrau previously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh no, this is the fourth. They've actually met in Ulytau, Turkestan, and Atyrau previously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The previous sessions of the National Kurultai took place in Ulytau, Turkestan, and Atyrau.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. So it’s not brand new. When did this whole National Kurultai thing even start?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. So it's not brand new. When did this whole National Kurultai thing even start?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev decreed its establishment on June 15th, 2022. So, uh, relatively recent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev decreed its establishment on June fifteenth, twenty twenty two. So, uh, relatively recent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 15, 2022, President Tokayev decreed the establishment of the National Kurultai under the President, approved its regulations, and determined its composition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And who exactly is in this body? Is it just, like, government officials?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And who exactly is in this body? Is it just, like, government officials?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's quite specific. One representative from each regional public council.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's quite specific. One representative from each regional public council.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The body includes one representative from each regional public council.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Regional public council. Hmm. So it's like a way to get opinions from, um, all over the country?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Regional public council. Hmm. So it's like a way to get opinions from, um, all over the country?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. That’s the, uh, whole idea behind it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. That's the, uh, whole idea behind it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Got it. Okay, that actually makes way more sense now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Got it. Okay, that actually makes way more sense now.
